HT_Text_BOS_Instructions.message: <FC 30,10,0>Navigate around the pages using <SB HT_PadAction_BOS_NavigateDPad> <N>Change pages using <SB HT_PadAction_BOS_TABCycleLeft> and <SB HT_PadAction_BOS_TABCycleRight><N>Scroll long descriptions with <SB HT_PadAction_BOS_PageUp>.
